Articles.Content:
Well... Hi.........

Erm, ok, past the awkward introduction silence...

I created an account here awhile back but only just recently managed to get my hands on the paid version, so... That means a ton of posts from me (Apologies in advance)!

I look forward to destroying many spacecraft with you all!

Vasili

(Wow I\'m bad at introduction posts)

Lol thats ok.

need any help? send me a PM.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Thanks to both of you.

And I\'ll keep that in mind, as of right now I\'m okay though, just decking out my installation with parts and plugins.
I use mechjeb, and no other add on\'s with the update to .15 you get way more things then you need. I will say that some addons look mighty fine

Oh yeah, I\'ve already got a few thiings like the KW Challenger Pack and the Robotics Pack, giant walking spiders with sidewinder missles ftw!

Suffice to say, I\'m going to enjoy this game.
